feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.3.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix password reset bug by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/559
  • fix dark mode by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/558
  • fix signature url issue by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/560
  • fix matrix input email format issue by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/562
  • fix email from address in self hosted mode by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/573
  • utm tracking in db by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/574
  • Better Form Stats by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/567
  • 104a6 utm tracking in db by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/578
  • form color reset by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/577
  • 104a6 simpler submit transition by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/576
  • Form editor v2 by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/579
  • 7953e better form editor by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/580
  • Custom SMTP Settings by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/561

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.3.6...v1.3.7

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.4.0 New Email integration, mentions
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 106a6 integration performance issues by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/581
  • fix closed form by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/583
  • fix phone input height by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/585
  • fix checkbox input by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/582
  • [ESC-340] Fix Underline on text block by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/598
  • apply first submission modal changes by @madassdev in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/584
  • Apply Mentions everywhere by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/595

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.3.7...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: UI improvements - email reply to fix
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Form Editor v2.5 by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/599
  • fix undefined error on integrations by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/601
  • improve email notfication migration by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/602
  • Fix email notification reply to by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/603

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: Fix Icon bug
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ESC-365] = on fetch submission data display error if there by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.4.3 Fix matrix + bump client dep
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Right to left mode by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/611
  • Matrix Improvements by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3
